title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 269/93 of 5 February 1993 fixing the definitive production aid for certain processed tomato products in respect of the 1992/93 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 269/93 of 5 February 1993 fixing the definitive production aid for certain processed tomato products in respect of the 1992/93 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The provisional level of production aid fixed by Regulation (EEC) No 2023/92 shall be definitive for the products listed in Annex I.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 February 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 49, 27. 2. 1986, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 166, 20. 6. 1992, p. 5.
(3) OJ No L 103, 16. 4. 1984, p. 19.
(4) OJ No L 180, 1. 7. 1992, p. 25.
(5) OJ No L 203, 21. 7. 1992, p. 11.
(6) OJ No L 207, 23. 7. 1992, p. 11.
